EmailTemplate.name: Breakfast Series Invite - Waltham
EmailTemplate.subject: Give American Student Assistance your feedback at Waltham breakfast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
HAVE BREAKFAST WITH US! American Student Assistance® is always looking for ways to incorporate your suggestions into our business.
What are our strengths? How can we improve? We want to hear from you!
Please join us for an interactive feedback session: September 25, 9 – 11 a.m. Doubletree Guest Suites (Hasting II) 550 Winter Street, Waltham, MA (Breakfast will be provided.)
RSVP by September 18 to Sherryann Lordes at slordes@amsa.com. We look forward to seeing you!
We look forward to seeing you! Paul C. Combe President & CEO American Student Assistance
